comments: When a symptom catalog is open inside the SDB editor, and that symptom catalog is changed outside of the editor, the SDB editor needs to refresh.  The editor is not refreshing at the current time and this causes exceptions to occur in downstream consumers who add extensions to the editor.
*** Bug 137048 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
I don't see this as a valid scenario. Please book a meeting to go over your usecase

The current plan is to no longer modify the catalogs "under the covers" during analysis.  However, there will be a new menu item in the Log Navigator to convert XPath rules to another type of rule on a symptom catalog, and if the catalog is open in the editor when this menu item is selected, the editor will still need to refresh.

Malcom Zung

------------------------------------------

The editor should refresh the content, that is a standard editor behaviour. We'll keep the TPTP defect opened by you to address this problem.
Thanks,

Alexandru Nan - Software Developer
